Package org.nnsoft.shs

Public APIs of a simple HTTP Server.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DefaultResponseBuilder Builder to associate a predefined response when serving specific status codes.
HttpServer An Simple Server implementation able to serve
HttpServerConfiguration The Server configuration.
HttpServerConfigurator The Server configuration.
RequestHandlerBuilder Chained builder to associate a RequestHandler to a previously specified path.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHttpServerConfiguration An abstract RequestDispatcherConfiguration implementation that helps on dropping the boilerplate code of repeating the binder variable reference when binding.
 

Enum Summary
HttpServer.Status Statuses that the Server can assume.
 

Exception Summary
InitException  
RunException  
SHSException Base exception for the basic HTTP server.
ShutdownException  
 

Package org.nnsoft.shs Description

Public APIs of a simple HTTP Server.
